game_description: Experience the ultimate dance workout on Oculus Quest. Enter a futuristic world where dancers battle in secret underground competitions. Take on 9 characters from around the globe. They‚Äôre going to throw down some crazy dance moves so be ready! Harness all your power to rise to the top of the leaderboards. With 45 songs by f-777 and custom songs to master, it‚Äôs now time to level up. FEATURES - 45 original songs by f-777 - 9 Characters from around the world including a new boss character - Custom Songs - Local and global leaderboards so you can compete with friends at home and worldwide - New futuristic arenas - Easy, Normal, Pro and Extreme difficulties to challenge even the most hardcore players
Languages: English, French (France), German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Spanish (Spain)
review_1: Hi really good looking exercise type dance /touch game‚Ä¶graphics of the 8 characters very impressive and detailed‚Ä¶.seems to be a good progression learning curve‚Ä¶.music about 40tracks .instrumental electro sound. Hopefully lose a few pounds trying this outüëçüëçüëçüëçüëç
review_2: I've been playing this game since 2018! I have been waiting for it on the quest 2 and it's here! Hands down the BEST dance game out there. If you're a dancer you will LOVE this game. For serious! Great job devs!!!
review_3: Very entertaining game that gives you a decent workout. Played for an hour and it certainly made me sweat! It's very well presented, with great graphics and although the music isn't to my taste, it actually fits the game perfectly and there hasn't been a track yet that I haven't enjoyed. Well worth the money! Find us on Facebook - Group name "Ridoculus - Oculus Quest / SideQuest / App Lab"
review_4: Almost just like the PC version. Gameplay and challenge is all the same. I already forgot what the PC version feels like.
review_5: Great fun game with awesome music.. Good Job Devs... So Glad it's on the quest.. It's like Being at a rave!! :) The magic all again..
